org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui
[Groovy] Class DefaultWindow

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
      com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponentContainer
          com.vaadin.ui.Panel
              com.vaadin.ui.Window
                  org.grails.plugin.vaadin.ui.DefaultWindow

class DefaultWindow
extends com.vaadin.ui.Window

Mimics the Grails main.gsp top-level template.

Note that the layout can be customised by modifying the HTML in VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts/main.html

You can also specify a different HTML layout to use, in the constructor

Authors:
Francis McKenzie

Constructor Summary
DefaultWindow()

Create the window using the default 'main.html' page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts, and with the default title 'Grails'
DefaultWindow(java.lang.String caption)

Create the window using the default 'main.html' page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts, and with the specified title.
DefaultWindow(java.lang.String caption, java.lang.String layoutName)

Create the window using the specified HTML layout page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts, and with the specified title.
 
Method Summary
protected void buildLayout()

Subclasses may override to customise layout
com.vaadin.ui.Component getBody()

Get the body component (the list, show, edit, create, etc. view should be added to this)

Get the footer component (currently empty in standard Grails 2.0.x scaffolding)
com.vaadin.ui.Component getHeader()

Get the banner header component (the logo should be added to this)

mainLayout

public com.vaadin.ui.CustomLayout mainLayout

 
Constructor Detail

DefaultWindow

DefaultWindow()
Create the window using the default 'main.html' page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts, and with the default title 'Grails'

DefaultWindow

DefaultWindow(java.lang.String caption)
Create the window using the default 'main.html' page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts, and with the specified title.
Parameters:
caption - The window title (caption)

DefaultWindow

DefaultWindow(java.lang.String caption, java.lang.String layoutName)
Create the window using the specified HTML layout page in web-app/VAADIN/themes/{theme}/layouts, and with the specified title.
Parameters:
caption - The window title (caption)
layoutName - The name of the HTML page to use for the layout
